detailedSummary: Basic colors in Arabic: ahmar (red), azraq (blue), akhdar (green), asfar (yellow), aswad (black), abyad (white), ramadi (gray), bunni (brown), burtuqali (orange), wardiyy (pink).
whyItMatters: Mastering Colors: أحمر, أزرق, أخضر, أصفر is essential for building a strong foundation in arabic - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
